perturbation.original_text: The undersigned hereby agree that the Schedule 13G/A with respect to the shares of Class A Common Stock, $0.001 par value per share, of The RMR Group Inc., dated as of December 31, 2019, is, and any amendments thereto (including amendments on Schedule 13D) signed by each of the undersigned shall be, filed on behalf of each of us pursuant to and in accordance with the provisions of Rule 13d-1(k) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.
perturbation.changed_text: The undersigned hereby agree that the Schedule 13G/A with respect to the shares of Class A Common Stock, $0.001 par value per share, of The RMR Group Inc., dated as of December 31, 2019, may be filed on behalf of each of us.
perturbation.explanation: By changing 'is' to 'may be' and removing 'and any amendments thereto (including amendments on Schedule 13D) signed by each of the undersigned shall be, filed on behalf of each of us pursuant to and in accordance with the provisions of Rule 13d-1(k) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.' this removes the legally required obligation to file amendments to Schedule 13G/A under SEC rules, potentially leading to non-compliance with securities laws.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Rule 13d-1(k) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934

perturbation.original_text: January 22, 2020 (Date) ABP TRUST /s/ Adam D. Portnoy (Signature) Adam D. Portnoy, President (Name/Title) ADAM D. PORTNOY /s/ Adam D. Portnoy (Signature)
perturbation.changed_text: ABP TRUST /s/ Adam D. Portnoy (Signature) Adam D. Portnoy, President (Name/Title)
perturbation.explanation: Removing the date of the agreement and the second signature 'ADAM D. PORTNOY /s/ Adam D. Portnoy (Signature)' weakens the enforceability of the agreement. SEC filings require proper dating and authorization. This creates a legal risk as it makes it harder to prove when the agreement was made and whether it was fully authorized by all parties involved.
perturbation.contradicted_law: SEC regulations regarding proper filing and authorization of documents
